document.full_text: at least 20 soldiers were killed in a clash between south sudan's army and rebel militia fighters, the army said on wednesday, the latest violence to unsettle the region ahead of its independence in july.
document.title: south sudan army, militia clashes kill 20: army
lines_and_colors: at least 20 soldiers were killed in a clash between south sudan's army and rebel militia fighters, the army said on wednesday, the latest violence to unsettle the region ahead of its independence in july.
